description.value:
When you reach a Sorcerer level specified in the Knowledge Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Knowledge Domain Spells
Sorcerer LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAugury0000]{Augury}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCommand000]{Command}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplIdentify00]{Identify}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSuggestion]{Suggestion}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplNondetecti]{Nondetection}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpeakWithD]{Speak with Dead}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplArcaneEye0]{Arcane Eye}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplConfusion0]{Confusion}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplLegendLore]{Legend Lore}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplScrying000]{Scrying}
